name: Carrots on the shelf
description:
Oh no! The carrots has turned into life and they are trying to kill you! And now you need to shoot them down from your shelf!

Move: WASD, Arrow Keys

Mouse button to shoot

This is a game I made for the Trijam #172, I made it in 3 hours

Theme: Off the shelf

Made in Scratch

Music:

Title: Volatile Reaction

Music: Kevin MacLeod

License: CC BY 3.0
